200.day: A rumble and a bit of a sprinkle. A classic British 'surprise'.
200.night: A rumble and a bit of a sprinkle in the dark. Hope it doesn't wake the neighbours!

201.day: Bit more than a spit and spot now, a proper thunderstorm with rain.
201.night: Bit more than a spit and spot now, a proper thunderstorm with rain at night.

202.day: Crikey, a heavy thunderstorm! Sounds like the heavens are really having a go.
202.night: Crikey, a heavy thunderstorm at night! Sounds like the monsters are having a party.

210.day: Just a light rumble and a bit of a show.
210.night: Just a light rumble and a bit of a light show in the night sky.

211.day: A proper thunderstorm brewing. Best keep an eye on the sky!
211.night: A proper thunderstorm brewing in the dark. Best stay tucked up in bed!

212.day: Heavy thunderstorm alert! Sounds a bit dramatic, doesn't it?
212.night: Heavy thunderstorm alert at night! Sounds a bit dramatic for bedtime, doesn't it?

221.day: A raggedy old thunderstorm, still packing a punch though.
221.night: A raggedy old thunderstorm rumbling through the night.

230.day: Thunder with a light drizzle. Bit of a weird one, that.
230.night: Thunder with a light drizzle in the dark. A bit of a spooky mix.

231.day: Thunder and drizzle. A bit of a dampener, literally.
231.night: Thunder and drizzle at night. A bit of a dampener on any late-night strolls.

232.day: Thunder with heavy drizzle. That's a proper soaking if you're not careful.
232.night: Thunder with heavy drizzle in the dark. That's a proper soaking if you're out and about.

day: Just a light intensity drizzle. Barely enough to notice... until you realise you're a bit damp.
A fine mist of drizzle. The kind that gets right into your bones.
night: Just a light intensity drizzle in the night. Barely enough to notice... until your pyjamas feel a bit damp.
A fine mist of drizzle in the dark. The kind that makes everything feel a bit clammy.

day: A standard drizzle. Enough to make the pavements gleam and your hair frizz.
Just 'drizzle', they say. Don't be fooled, it's determined to make you slightly uncomfortable.
night: A standard drizzle at night. Enough to make the streets gleam under the streetlights.
Just 'drizzle' they say, even in the dark. Still determined to make things slightly uncomfortable.

day: Heavy intensity drizzle. That's practically rain in disguise.
More of a persistent soaking than a drizzle, really.
night: Heavy intensity drizzle at night. That's practically rain while you're trying to sleep.
More of a persistent soaking than a drizzle in the darkness, really.

day: Light intensity drizzle rain. A right old mix! Best to be prepared for a bit of dampness.
A bit of light drizzle with some rain thrown in for good measure. You know how it is.
night: Light intensity drizzle rain at night. A right old mix! Hope it doesn't keep you awake.
A bit of light drizzle with some rain in the dark. You know how it is, even at night.

day: Drizzle and rain together. The classic British wet weather combo.
A steady mix of drizzle and rain. Perfect for staying indoors with a cuppa.
night: Drizzle and rain together at night. The classic British wet weather combo, even after dark.
A steady mix of drizzle and rain in the night. Perfect for staying indoors with a hot chocolate.

day: Heavy intensity drizzle rain. That's a proper soaking waiting to happen.
More like a downpour disguised as drizzle.
night: Heavy intensity drizzle rain at night. That's a proper soaking waiting to happen while you're dreaming.
More like a downpour disguised as drizzle in the darkness.

day: Shower rain and drizzle. A bit of everything, then?
On-again, off-again with the showers and drizzle. You might get lucky, but probably not.
night: Shower rain and drizzle at night. A bit of everything, even when it's dark?
On-again, off-again with the showers and drizzle in the night. You might get lucky and stay dry... until the next one.

day: Heavy shower rain and drizzle. Sounds like a right old mess out there!
That's a proper deluge of showers and drizzle.
night: Heavy shower rain and drizzle at night. Sounds like a right old mess out there while you're sleeping!
That's a proper deluge of showers and drizzle in the darkness.

day: Shower drizzle. One of those annoying little bursts of dampness.
Just a little bit of drizzle. Might clear up quickly... or not.
night: Shower drizzle at night. One of those annoying little bursts of dampness in the dark.
Just a little bit of drizzle in the night. Might clear up quickly... or not, it's hard to tell in the dark.

day: Just a bit of light rain. Barely enough to ruffle your feathers.
A gentle shower of light rain. The kind that makes the roses happy (and you slightly damp).
night: Just a bit of light rain at night. Barely enough to hear on the roof.
A gentle shower of light rain in the dark. The kind that makes the streets glisten under the moonlight.

day: Moderate rain. Enough to make you think twice about that walk.
A steady bit of rain. Not torrential, but enough to soak you through eventually.
night: Moderate rain at night. Enough to make you glad you're indoors.
A steady bit of rain in the darkness. Not torrential, but enough to make everything properly wet by morning.

day: Heavy intensity rain! That's a proper downpour.
Right, the heavens have well and truly opened.
night: Heavy intensity rain at night! That's a proper downpour while you're trying to sleep.
Right, the heavens have well and truly opened in the dead of night.

day: Very heavy rain! Blimey, it's really coming down in stair rods!
That's more like a waterfall than rain!
night: Very heavy rain at night! Blimey, it's really coming down in stair rods outside!
That's more like a waterfall than rain in the darkness!

day: Extreme rain! This is biblical stuff.
Crikey, the weather's gone properly mad! That's an awful lot of rain.
night: Extreme rain at night! This is biblical stuff happening outside your window.
Crikey, the weather's gone properly mad in the dark! That's an awful lot of rain.

day: Freezing rain! Treacherous conditions out there. Ice and wet – a delightful combo.
That's icy rain, folks. Be very careful if you're out and about, it'll be slippy!
night: Freezing rain at night! Treacherous conditions if you're out. Ice and wet – a delightful nighttime combo.
That's icy rain in the dark, folks. Be very careful if you have to venture out, it'll be slippy!

day: Light intensity shower rain. A brief little burst, hopefully.
Just a light shower passing through. Might not even get you properly wet.
night: Light intensity shower rain at night. A brief little burst, hopefully it won't last long.
Just a light shower passing through in the night. Might not even properly wet the ground by morning.

day: Shower rain. Could be a quick one, could linger.
A bit of shower rain about. Might get caught in it if you're unlucky.
night: Shower rain at night. Could be a quick one, could linger until morning.
A bit of shower rain about in the dark. Might get caught in it if you're unlucky enough to be out.

day: Heavy intensity shower rain. Sounds like a proper soaking if you get caught in that downpour!
That's a hefty shower!
night: Heavy intensity shower rain at night. Sounds like a proper soaking if you get caught in that downpour!
That's a hefty shower in the middle of the night!

day: Ragged shower rain. On and off, a bit unpredictable.
One of those messy, intermittent showers. You might dodge it, you might not.
night: Ragged shower rain at night. On and off, a bit unpredictable in the darkness.
One of those messy, intermittent showers in the night. You might wake up to puddles, you might not.

600.day: Light snow falling. Looks a bit picturesque, doesn't it? Wrap up warm!
600.night: Light snow falling at night. Looks a bit magical under the streetlights. Wrap up warm if you're out!

601.day: It's snowing! Proper snow now. Time for some winter fun (and maybe a shovel later).
601.night: It's snowing at night! Proper snow now. Time for some quiet winter magic.

602.day: Heavy snow! Looks like a proper whiteout out there. Take it easy if you're travelling.
602.night: Heavy snow at night! Looks like a proper whiteout outside. Take it easy if you're travelling in the morning.

611.day: Sleet. That lovely mix of rain and snow that's just generally unpleasant. Take care on the roads.
611.night: Sleet at night. That lovely mix of rain and snow that's just generally unpleasant, even in the dark. Take care on the roads in the morning.

612.day: Light shower sleet. A brief flurry of the messy stuff.
612.night: Light shower sleet at night. A brief flurry of the messy stuff.

613.day: Shower sleet. One of those icy bursts. Not the nicest!
613.night: Shower sleet at night. One of those icy bursts. Not the nicest way to end the day!

615.day: Light rain and snow. A bit of a wintry mix. Keep warm!
615.night: Light rain and snow at night. A bit of a wintry mix. Keep warm if you're out!

616.day: Rain and snow. Proper messy conditions. Take it easy out there.
616.night: Rain and snow at night. Proper messy conditions. Take it easy if you're out and about.

620.day: Light shower snow. Just a little flurry, might not last.
620.night: Light shower snow at night. Just a little flurry, might not last until morning.

621.day: Shower snow. A bit more persistent than a flurry.
621.night: Shower snow at night. A bit more persistent than a flurry.

622.day: Heavy shower snow. Could accumulate quickly!
622.night: Heavy shower snow at night. Could accumulate quickly while you're sleeping!

701.day: Mist in the air. Makes everything look a bit eerie. Drive carefully.
701.night: Mist in the air tonight. Makes everything look a bit ghostly under the streetlights. Drive carefully if you're out.

711.day: Smoky conditions reported. Keep those windows closed!
711.night: Smoky conditions reported tonight. Keep those windows closed while you sleep!

721.day: Hazy today. Makes the sunshine look a bit odd.
721.night: Hazy tonight. Makes the moon look a bit odd.

731.day: Dusty/sandy conditions. Might want to keep the windows shut and perhaps wear a mask if you're sensitive.
731.night: Dusty/sandy conditions tonight. Might want to keep the windows shut overnight.

741.day: Foggy as pea soup! Can barely see a thing. Take it very slow if you're out and about.
741.night: Foggy as pea soup tonight! Can barely see a thing. Take it very slow if you're out and about.

751.day: Sand in the air! A bit unusual for the UK. Might want to protect your eyes.
751.night: Sand in the air tonight! A bit unusual for the UK at night.

761.day: Dusty/sandy conditions. Might want to keep the windows shut and perhaps wear a mask if you're sensitive.
761.night: Dusty/sandy conditions tonight. Might want to keep the windows shut overnight.

762.day: Volcanic ash reported. Best to stay indoors and follow any local advice.
762.night: Volcanic ash reported tonight. Best to stay indoors and follow any local advice.

771.day: Squalls reported. Sounds a bit dramatic! Expect sudden increases in wind speed.
771.night: Squalls reported tonight. Sounds a bit dramatic! Expect sudden increases in wind speed.

781.day: Tornado! Right, that's serious. Seek shelter immediately and follow safety guidelines!
781.night: Tornado! Right, that's serious. Seek shelter immediately and follow safety guidelines!

day: Clear sky! Get out there and soak up that rare British sunshine.
Lovely clear skies. Makes a change, doesn't it?
night: Clear sky tonight! Perfect for stargazing.
Lovely clear skies tonight. Makes a change, doesn't it?

day: A few clouds dotted about. Nothing to worry about just yet.
Patches of blue with a smattering of clouds. Could be a decent day after all!
night: A few clouds dotted about tonight. Nothing to worry about just yet.
Patches of clear sky with a smattering of clouds tonight. Could be a decent night after all!

day: Scattered clouds. Could brighten up, could cloud over more. The suspense!
More clouds than blue sky, but nothing too ominous... yet.
night: Scattered clouds tonight. Could stay clear, could cloud over more. The suspense!
More clouds than clear sky tonight, but nothing too ominous... yet.

day: Broken clouds. Looks a bit grey, doesn't it?
Broken clouds. Looks like the sky's having a bit of a patchy moment.
night: Broken clouds tonight. Looks a bit grey, even in the dark, doesn't it?
Broken clouds tonight. Enough to make it feel a bit moody, but not a total blackout.

day: Overcast clouds. Solid grey sky. Don't expect much sunshine today.
Overcast clouds. Looks like the sky's put its grumpy face on this morning.
night: Overcast clouds tonight. Solid grey sky. Don't expect much moonlight.
Overcast clouds tonight. A solid blanket of grey up there. The moon's gone into hiding.

default.day: The weather is doing its thing... whatever that is. Best to have a look outside!
default.night: The weather is doing its thing tonight... whatever that is. Best to have a peek out the window before bed!
